channel.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
channel.description:
Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
I'm curious to find out how he made it in scar. :)

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Thanks Morgoth, but is a SCAR window supposed to come up and show something? I don’t really understand this.

But how to make it visible? Or is it possible somehow to get the Windows built in IE control on a SCAR form?
I just saw this. Umm, I'm guessing you don't know. Drat! :(

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

Ok, there is this HTTPClient in SCAR. You can do things like that with it:

program New;
var
  client: integer;
  str: TStringList;
begin
  client := InitializeHTTPClient(false, false);
  str := TSTRINGLIST.create;
  str.add(GetHTTPPage(client, 'http://va5.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/game.ws?lowmem=1&plugin=0'));
  str.SaveToFile('c:\foo.html');
  //OpenWebPage('c:\foo.html');
end.

But how to make it visible? Or is it possible somehow to get the Windows built in IE control on a SCAR form?

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Starblaster100:

actually what Ron is talking about is a RS client completely built in SCAR. It didn’t use the Main page at all (Well technically it does, but we dont need to open it in a web browser ;))

That’s…Exactly what I meant! But… how do I browse to a RuneScape world and play RS using a custom built browser made exclusively in scar?

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

I made a worldswitcher in SCAR. But that was more than a year ago. It worked only on Firefox. It auto bought runes from certain shops, switched to the next world when the world was bought out. I could set the lower margin of any rune (e.g. it did not buy any more airs, when the stock was below 3500 (or any other number I set). It was lamely coded. It probably does not work anymore. I made ~5 mil with it, then got a temp ban Did not use it again. So probably I am not gonna share it

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Well… OpenWebPage() could do it, I suppose
I just figure it’s easier (or more reliable) to use a plugin since you’d have better control… and could more easily return the applet window handle to SCAR so it’d automatically set window target again.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone have Cruel's SCAR World Switcher?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh you didn’t make it?

And the only way to make one is to make a plugin? Gee that sucks. I figured you could do it just by using those Connection Functions from the help manual.
